metadata.title: CVE-2018-15159 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libesedb_page_read_tags function in libesedb_page.c in libesedb through 2018-04-01 allows remote attackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via a crafted esedb file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHub issue comments.

criterions.comment: libesedb package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
